concept.title: File Path and Offset Header Attributes
concept.shortdesc: The Directory and File Tail origins include record header attributes that provide the file path and name, as well as the offset for each record. To track the provenance of each record, you can use a function to include this information in the records.

conbody.p:
file pathrecord header attributeoffsetheader attributeDirectory originadditional header attributesFile Tail originadditional header attributesThe Directory and File Tail origins include the following additional record header attributes:
file - Provides the file path and name.
offset - Provides the offset in bytes.
